latex:
Find the value(s) of $ x$ such that $ 8xy-12y+2x-3=0$ is true for all values of $ y$.\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{2}{3} \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{3}{2}\text{ or }-\frac{1}{4} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ -\frac{2}{3}\text{ or }-\frac{1}{4} \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{3}{2} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ -\frac{3}{2}\text{ or }-\frac{1}{4}$
